title: Shaunessy Community
description: A community platform for Shaunessy HOA featuring event management, member directory, and resource sharing.
achievements: Developed RESTful API with Node.js and TypeScript handling 5,000+ requests daily
Implemented user authentication and role-based access control with JWT
Designed responsive frontend using React with Material-UI
Integrated MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval

title: Beep-Beep
description: A cross-platform ride-sharing application demonstrating Kotlin Multiplatform's potential with seamless backend integration.
achievements: Designed and implemented shared business logic using KMP, enabling 90% code reuse across Android and iOS platforms
Developed scalable backend services with Ktor framework handling 10,000+ daily requests
Integrated MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval with optimized queries
Implemented real-time location tracking and ride matching algorithms
Created responsive UI with Jetpack Compose following Material Design guidelines

title: Budgetwise
description: Personal finance management app with intuitive budgeting tools.
achievements: Redesigned UI/UX leading to 25% improvement in user retention
Integrated with financial APIs for real-time transaction data synchronization
Implemented secure local storage using Room Database with encryption
Developed custom charting components for financial data visualization
Optimized app performance reducing load times by 40%

title: Earth Hero
description: Climate change awareness app with actionable sustainability tips.
achievements: Increased daily active users by 40% through gamification features
Reduced crash rate by 60% through comprehensive error handling
Implemented push notification system for daily sustainability tips
Designed interactive carbon footprint calculator
Optimized battery consumption by 30% through background task management

title: Honey Mart Server
description: Backend service for an e-commerce marketplace platform.
achievements: Built RESTful API handling 500+ requests per minute with 99.9% uptime
Optimized PostgreSQL queries reducing average response time by 35%
Implemented JWT authentication and role-based authorization
Developed payment processing system integrating Stripe API
Created comprehensive API documentation using OpenAPI specification

title: QuoteWire
description: A Kotlin Multiplatform project showcasing a quote wire application.
achievements: Implemented shared view models using KMP for consistent business logic
Developed platform-specific UI layers while maintaining shared architecture
Integrated with public quote API for real-time data fetching
Implemented offline-first strategy with local caching
Created responsive design adapting to multiple screen sizes

title: MovieApp
description: A Kotlin Android project showcasing a movie application.
achievements: Implemented MVVM architecture with clean separation of concerns
Integrated with TMDB API for movie data and images
Developed custom XML layouts with responsive design
Implemented pagination for smooth scrolling through movie lists
Added comprehensive unit tests achieving 85% code coverage

title: Clubs
description: A Kotlin Android project showcasing a social media application.
achievements: Built social feed with real-time updates using Firebase
Implemented user authentication with email/password and Google Sign-In
Created custom UI components with Jetpack Compose
Optimized image loading with caching and placeholders
Added dark/light theme support following system preferences

title: Book Application
description: A Kotlin Android project showcasing a book application.
achievements: Developed book catalog with search and filtering functionality
Implemented clean architecture with repository pattern
Created custom book detail screens with Jetpack Compose
Integrated with Google Books API for content enrichment

title: Weather Desktop Application
description: Weather desktop app using Jetpack compose.
achievements: Extended KMP shared code to desktop platform targets
Integrated with multiple weather APIs for comprehensive data
Implemented location-based weather forecasting

title: trivia-tide
